column1: 1. Use VLOOKUP to fill in Customer Name and City in the Orders sheet based on Customer ID.
2. Use VLOOKUP to fill in Product Name and Unit Price in the Orders sheet based on Product ID.
3. Create a new column to calculate Total Price (Unit Price * Quantity).
4. Bonus: Which city has the highest total sales? Use SUMIF or Pivot Table to find out.
